pages.title: L2 Hostility
pages.text: $(bold)L2 Hostility$() controls game $(key)difficulty$(). Killing strong mobs raises it; dying lowers it. Mobs may spawn with special abilities called $(key)"traits"$().$(br2)Higher-level mobs have more $(bold)damage$() and $(bold)health$(), and stronger $(key)traits$(). Each $(key)trait$() has counterplay.

pages.title: Invisible/Repelling/Pulling
pages.text: $(key)Traits$() are strong, but beatable. Counters:$(br)$(list)$(bold)Invisible$(): wear $(key)Detector Glasses$() to see invisible mobs.$(br)$(list)$(bold)Repelling/Pulling$(): the $(key)Insulator$() enchantment mitigates the effect.

pages.title: Debuff Traits
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Weakener/Stray/Poisonous/Withering/Blinder/Distorter...$():$(br)$(key)Ring of Divinity$() or $(key)Ring of Reflection$() can block most negative effects. Alternatively, use the $(bold)exclusive enchantments$() on the $(boss/t4/old_champion)Breastplate$() to resist specific debuffs.

pages.title: Regen/Undying/Dispell
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Regenerate/Undying$(): apply Cursed effect to stop mobs from healing, e.g. with $(key)Spell Curse$().$(br)$(list)$(bold)Dispell$(): $(key)Spell Tearing$(), $(key)Spell Prism$(), and $(key)Imagine Breaker$() let spell damage pierce its protection.

pages.title: Adaptive
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Adaptive$(): besides debuffs, refresh a mob's adaptation by $(bold)switching$() spells â€” each spell counts as a damage type. $(key)Anti-Adaptation$() makes spells harder to adapt to, or use $(key)Spell Prism$() / $(key)Imagine Breaker$() to pierce the protection.

pages.title: ...rosion/Split/Teleport
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Corrosion/Erosion$(): $(mechanic/durability#hardened)Hardened$() greatly reduces durability damage to your gear.$(br)$(list)$(bold)Split$(): $(key)Split Suppress$() prevents mobs from splitting.$(br)$(list)$(bold)Teleport$(): apply $(key)Incarceration$() effect with the $(key)Ring of Incarceration$() or a $(key)Black Fire Charge$() to stop teleporting.

pages.title: Spell Traits
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Spell Traits$(): you can use $(key)Ring of Divinity$() or a $(mage/spell_container)Spell Container$() to reduce enemy spell damage against you. Later in the game, you can become completely immune to spell damage with $(key)Magic Immune$().

pages.title: Arena/Ragnarok
pages.text: $(list)$(bold)Arena$(): you can place or break blocks inside the arena with $(mage/spell#place)Remote Manipulation$() or $(mage/spell#break)Remote Destruction$().$(br)$(list)$(bold)Ragnarok$(): a $(key)Pocket Of Restoration$() can automatically remove seals from your equipment.
